00044 #ifndef _CONFIG_H_
00045 #define _CONFIG_H_
00046 
00047 // Compiler switch (do not change these settings)
00048 #include "lib_mcu/compiler.h"             // Compiler definitions
00049 #ifdef __GNUC__
00050    #include <avr/io.h>                    // Use AVR-GCC library
00051 #elif __ICCAVR__
00052    #define ENABLE_BIT_DEFINITIONS
00053    #include <ioavr.h>                     // Use IAR-AVR library
00054 #else
00055    #error Current COMPILER not supported
00056 #endif
00057

00062 #include "conf/conf_scheduler.h"

00064 // Board defines (do not change these settings)
00065 #define  STK525   1
00066 #define  USBKEY   2
00067 
00069 #undef  USE_ADC
00072 #define TARGET_BOARD STK525
00073 
00074 #if (TARGET_BOARD==USBKEY)
00077    #define USBKEY_HAS_321_DF
00078    #include "lib_board\usb_key\usb_key.h"
00079 #elif (TARGET_BOARD==STK525)
00080    #include "lib_board\stk_525\stk_525.h"
00081 #else
00082    #error TARGET_BOARD must be defined somewhere
00083 #endif
